title: Godrej Electricals commissions 12.5 MWp rooftop solar project in MP
description: On Monday, Godrej & Boyce's business unit Godrej Electricals & Electronics announced the commissioning of a 12.5 MWp rooftop solar project for a textile facility in Madhya Pradesh. The project, spread over 1 million square feet of manufacturing sheds, is one of the three largest rooftop solar installations in India and the first in the state. It aims to provide green energy to the textile facility, leading to an estimated annual saving of 17 million kWh of power.
